title: Enhancing Practical Web Development Competencies: Motivating Pre-Service Teachers Through Game-Based Programming Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can explain at least three motivational changes based on the ARCS model (Attention/Relevance/Confidence/Satisfaction) in game-based learning environments
Learners can design simple educational games and implement prototypes using the MakeCode Arcade platform
Participants can propose at least two strategies for applying motivational techniques to actual classroom instruction based on experiences in programming-integrated game development
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
